Action.author: jimthematrix
Action.body: ~pmullaney this is already supported by the EventHub, registerChaincodeEvent(), is that not sufficient?

Action.author: pmullaney
Action.body: as far as I knew, the mechanism to register directly with the fabric is still present in fabric-peer. This won't return the expected results as no chaincode events are sourced via the peer any longer. I'd like to either fail the registration or take it out of the protobuf definition. Its causing confusion as I have seen sdk implementations attempting to use it.
